attributes.action: Reduce the pay Members of Parliament in solidarity with the rest of the country.
attributes.additional_details: The government should cap the pay for the MPs and issue no more pay rises for the next 5 years.
attributes.background: Members of Parliament need to stand with the people of Britain and prove they are not as corrupt as the rest of the wold think they are. Many people are being made redundant will MPs make thousands for doing virtually nothing.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for setting MPs' pay. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out more about IPSA here: https://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Reform IPSA - cap MP payrises in line with other Public sector pay: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554400
